skills.name: Grim Scythe
skills.description: Reaps the life of the enemy with a deadly scythe. Acquires additional turn if the enemy dies.

skills.name: Plague
skills.description: Spreads a plague to all enemies with an 80% chance to inflict 2 Continuous Damage effects that lasts for 2 turns.

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skills.name: Doomsday
skills.description: Meteorites of doomsday fall on to the enemies and the inflicted damage increases with time. Stuns the enemy for 1 turn if the enemy is under continuous damage.
